oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Saturated Actions on C*-algebra Suspensions and Joins by Finite Cyclic Groups
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Passer, Benjamin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Operator Algebras
Mathematics - General Topology
Mathematics - Quantum Algebra
46L85
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present proofs of a C*-algebraic conjecture of Dabrowski, and certain topological cases of conjectures by Baum, Dabrowski, and Hajac, that generalize the Borsuk-Ulam theorem. We also formulate a different type of noncommutative join than the previous authors, which leads to additional open problems for finite group actions.
Comment: 11 pages. Version 2 updates citations and restructures arguments to include more previous work in the literature
